DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate safety information of BW430C when administered using the lower starting doses and slower dose escalations as recommended Global Data Sheet
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Evaluation of BW430C in Epilepsy
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Epilepsy with partial seizures Tonic clonic seizures Generalized seizures of LennoxGastaut Subjects whose seizures are easily recognizable at least one seizure per month and counts for 8 consecutive weeks prior to the start of the study drug. Concurrent AEDs: Subjects taking concurrent VPA. Exclusion criteria: Previous participation in a study of Lamictal Known hypersensitivity to any drugs Pregnant women nursing mothers women who may be pregnant women contemplating pregnancy during the study period
